text: Chak Amru railway station (, ) is located in Chak Amru town, Narowal district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Narowal district Category:Railway stations on Shahdara Bagh–Chak Amru Branch Line
title: Chak Amru railway station
